p.span: Use these verbs to show you are very sure about what you are saying:
have to, must, need to, should, shall, will
Use these verbs to say something that is possible or likely but not completely certain:
may, might, can, could, ought to
These adverbs show your opinion strongly:
clearly, obviously, in fact, of course, certainly
Use these adverbs to show that something usually happens, but not always.
often, frequently, typically, normally, usually, generally
attack someone who they think is weak.

TextFlow.p: See also the Writing Tip at sudden.
